trans-unit.source: Manages a collection of user-interface related <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Gestisce una raccolta di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> relativi all'interfaccia utente.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> can be enabled and disabled.
trans-unit.target: Ogni <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> possono essere abilitati e disabilitati.

trans-unit.source: Only enabled <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> objects will receive hit test and paint messages from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Abilitato solo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> oggetti riceveranno messaggi di hit test e di disegno dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> can be viewed as a proxy between user-interface related elements, which consist of all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> objects, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> può essere considerato come un proxy tra l'interfaccia utente gli elementi correlati, costituiti da tutti <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> oggetti e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Behavior Service Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c60cc41-4324-46b5-b444-b39eda7cb33f).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [Cenni preliminari sul servizio comportamento](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c60cc41-4324-46b5-b444-b39eda7cb33f).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> class interacts with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> classes.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice riportato di seguito viene illustrato come la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> classe interagisce con il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> classi.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> class.
trans-unit.target: Questo esempio di codice fa parte di un esempio più esaustivo disponibile per la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner.%23ctor%2A> constructor creates a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.GlyphCollection> and is enabled, by default.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner.%23ctor%2A> costruttore crea un nuovo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.GlyphCollection> ed è abilitata per impostazione predefinita.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> class.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio di codice riportato di seguito viene illustrato come inizializzare una nuova istanza della classe <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> class.
trans-unit.target: Questo esempio di codice fa parte di un esempio più esaustivo disponibile per la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" /> associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner" />.

trans-unit.source: When an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>, the collection sets this property so that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> can call back to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Quando un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> viene aggiunto al <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection> del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>, questa proprietà viene impostata la raccolta in modo che il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> è possibile richiamare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner" /> is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner" /> è abilitato.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner" /> is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner" /> è abilitato; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner.Enabled%2A> property is `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> class will send `HitTest` and `Paint` messages to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner.Enabled%2A> proprietà `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> classe invierà `HitTest` e `Paint` i messaggi inviati al <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to enable and disable an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice riportato di seguito viene illustrato come abilitare e disabilitare un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>.

trans-unit.source: For a full code listing, see [How to: Extend the Appearance and Behavior of Controls in Design Mode](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/68f85054-2253-47f5-a4f2-3f1ac8c9f27b).
trans-unit.target: Per un elenco completo di codice, vedere [procedura: estendere l'aspetto e comportamento dei controlli in modalità progettazione](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/68f85054-2253-47f5-a4f2-3f1ac8c9f27b).

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la raccolta <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> collection.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come accedere il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> insieme.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> class.
trans-unit.target: Questo esempio di codice fa parte di un esempio più esaustivo disponibile per la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> classe.

trans-unit.source: Forces the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" /> to refresh its adorner window.
trans-unit.target: Forza l'aggiornamento della finestra dello strumento decorativo dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to force an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> window to repaint.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come forzare un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> ridisegno di finestra.

trans-unit.source: For a full code listing, see [How to: Extend the Appearance and Behavior of Controls in Design Mode](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/68f85054-2253-47f5-a4f2-3f1ac8c9f27b).
trans-unit.target: Per un elenco completo di codice, vedere [procedura: estendere l'aspetto e comportamento dei controlli in modalità progettazione](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/68f85054-2253-47f5-a4f2-3f1ac8c9f27b).

trans-unit.source: Forces the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" /> to refresh its adorner window.
trans-unit.target: Forza l'aggiornamento della finestra dello strumento decorativo dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to force an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> window to repaint.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice riportato di seguito viene illustrato come forzare un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> ridisegno di finestra.

trans-unit.source: For a full code listing, see [How to: Extend the Appearance and Behavior of Controls in Design Mode](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/68f85054-2253-47f5-a4f2-3f1ac8c9f27b).
trans-unit.target: Per un elenco completo di codice, vedere [procedura: estendere l'aspetto e comportamento dei controlli in modalità progettazione](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/68f85054-2253-47f5-a4f2-3f1ac8c9f27b).

trans-unit.source: The area to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: Area da invalidare.

trans-unit.source: Forces the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" /> to refresh its adorner window within the given <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />.
trans-unit.target: Forza l'aggiornamento della finestra di strutturazione dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" /> all'interno di un dato oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> da invalidare.

trans-unit.source: Forces the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" /> to refresh its adorner window within the given <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" />.
trans-unit.target: Forza l'aggiornamento della finestra di strutturazione dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" /> all'interno di un dato oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" />.
